text: Guy LeBlanc (October 16, 1960 - April 27, 2015) was a Canadian keyboardist and composer. He led his own progressive rock band Nathan Mahl. He also had been a member of the British progressive band Camel from 2000 until his death. LeBlanc was born in Moncton, New Brunswick. He was married and had children. LeBlanc died from kidney cancer on April 27, 2015, aged 54. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1960 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Canadian composers Category:Canadian keyboardists Category:Cancer deaths in Canada Category:Deaths from kidney cancer Category:People from Moncton Category:People from New Brunswick
title: Guy LeBlanc
